timeline.bodyText:
Default is no retries?
Will the retry ever work? Will it be regular occurence?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: Ideally if the WAL FS is having an issue then this archive may also fail. By default we will try it (mandatory) once (so retries are 0) - then if this new config is set to a non-zero value we will try to repeat it for the configured times. Generally we are not going to configure it to a non-zero value.
